# Jazz Circle
> Interactive chord changes, harmonic analysis, and practice tools for 107 jazz standards.

Jazz Circle (jazz-circle.com) provides accurate chord progressions, detailed harmonic analysis,
voice-led piano voicings, and interactive practice tools for the most important jazz standards
in the repertoire. All content is original analysis — no copyrighted melodies or lyrics.

## What This Site Does

- Chord changes for 107 jazz standards with bar-by-bar breakdown
- Harmonic analysis: key centers, ii-V-I locations, modulations, borrowed chords
- Interactive chord chart with playback at adjustable tempo
- VexFlow staff notation for each standard
- Circle of fifths explorer and key-based navigation
- Practice tools: metronome, MIDI export, melody generator
- Transposition: all standards available in Gm and Em voicings

## Key Pages

- Home: https://jazz-circle.com
- All Standards: https://jazz-circle.com/standards
- Circle of Fifths: https://jazz-circle.com/circle
- Practice Tools: https://jazz-circle.com/practice

## Jazz Standards — Chord Changes & Harmonic Analysis
